summary: Passenger side airbag sensor malfunctioning, vehicle has heated seats. Sometimes when passenger is seated the passenger airbag does not turn on and the airbag malfunction light comes on.   There is a recall for the same issue for the same year model Subaru Recall #19V701000.  However, my particular Subaru does not fall within the date range listed on original recall, though it appears to be the exact same problem based on the description.
